item.title: Python and R Example Throughout Semester
item.description: Python Here are some example of what I did with Python during my time in SDS348. Python is one of the most popular languages used in the computer science realm. Since it can get complex real quick, it is important to first get the hang of some of the more basic codes. Here are some basic codes to get you adjusted to Python print("hello world") ## hello world By importing numpy as np, we can even use python to perform basic calculations!

item.title: Hello R Markdown
item.description: R Markdown This is an R Markdown document. Markdown is a simple formatting syntax for authoring HTML, PDF, and MS Word documents. For more details on using R Markdown see http://rmarkdown.rstudio.com. You can embed an R code chunk like this: summary(cars) ## speed dist ## Min. : 4.0 Min. : 2.00 ## 1st Qu.:12.0 1st Qu.: 26.00 ## Median :15.0 Median : 36.00 ## Mean :15.4 Mean : 42.98 ## 3rd Qu.

#Title: SDS 348 Project: 1 Exploratory Data Analysis #Author: Tu Hoang (tah2957) #Date: 10/20/2019 — Introduction The two dataset that I have decided to use for this Explorartory Data Anaylsis is a dataset named bad_drivers and another data set named USCancerRates. At first glance, these two dataset don’t have anything in common since one dealt with Cancer rates and the other dealt with factors contributing to inattentive drivers. I’ve decided to use this two dataset because I wanted to see if there was a plausible correction between inattentive drivers and cancer rates.

#Title: SDS 348 Project: 2 Modeling, Testing, and Predicting #Author: Tu Hoang (tah2957) #Date: 11/27/2019 — bad_drivers2<-bad_drivers%>%pivot_longer(cols = c("insurance_premiums","losses"), names_to = "PPIL", values_to="Cost(IP & L)") glimpse(bad_drivers2) ## Observations: 102 ## Variables: 8 ## $ state <chr> "Alabama", "Alabama", "Alaska", "Alaska", "Arizon… ## $ num_drivers <dbl> 18.8, 18.8, 18.1, 18.1, 18.6, 18.6, 22.4, 22.4, 1… ## $ perc_speeding <int> 39, 39, 41, 41, 35, 35, 18, 18, 35, 35, 37, 37, 4… ## $ perc_alcohol <int> 30, 30, 25, 25, 28, 28, 26, 26, 28, 28, 28, 28, 3… ## $ perc_not_distracted <int> 96, 96, 90, 90, 84, 84, 94, 94, 91, 91, 79, 79, 8… ## $ perc_no_previous <int> 80, 80, 94, 94, 96, 96, 95, 95, 89, 89, 95, 95, 8… ## $ PPIL <chr> "insurance_premiums", "losses", "insurance_premiu… ## $ `Cost(IP & L)` <dbl> 784.

item.title: About Me
item.description: Hello, my name is Tu Hoang and I am a Senior BSA-Biology Student at the University of Texas at Austin. I was born in Vietnam and move to the United States when I was 3 years old. I have lived in Houston ever since and could not asked for a better city to live in than the Bayou City. I am a first generation college student and just counting down the days until I graduate.
